title: More D for air travel, more D for plane mechanics

content.prompt: Which of the following is most likely to shift the demand for aircraft mechanics to the right?

choices.label: An increase in the demand for air travel
An increase in the price of a license necessary for aircraft mechanics
A decrease in the price of a license necessary for aircraft mechanics
A decrease in the demand for air travel
A decrease in the marginal productivity of aircraft mechanics

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
